item.title: Brown mass shooting and MIT professor murder may be linked: Sources
item.description: The mass shooting at Brown University and the murder of an MIT professor in Brookline, Massachusetts, may be linked.

item.title: WATCH: Small plane crashes while landing at regional NC airport
item.description: A Cessna C550 crashed while landing at Statesville Regional Airport earlier this morning around 10:20am in North Carolina, according to the FAA.
